name: Munki
body:
### Welcome to Munki!
Munki is the most widely used open source software deployment tool for the OS X platform. Munki is surrounded by a vibrant community that is passionate about deploying software on OS X while providing an excellent user experience.


### Getting started
To get started with Munki, jump over to the [Munki Wiki](https://github.com/munki/munki/wiki). There is thorough documentation on how to use every facet of the Munki project.


### Community
Part of what makes Munki so popular is the fantastic community that surrounds it. If you want to get involved in the community, you can join the [mailing list](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/munki-dev), pop into the [##osx-server IRC channel on Freenode](http://webchat.freenode.net/?randomnick=1&channels=%23%23osx-server) or come to one of many [Mac Admin conferences](https://github.com/munki/munki/wiki/More-Links-And-Tools#mac-admin-conferences) around the world.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
